column7: Population Density, as of 1 July (persons per square km)
column8: Population Sex Ratio, as of 1 July (males per 100 females)
column18: Total Fertility Rate (live births per woman)
column19: Net Reproduction Rate (surviving daughters per woman)
column21: Sex Ratio at Birth (males per 100 female births)
column26: Life Expectancy at Birth, both sexes (years)
column29: Life Expectancy at Age 15, both sexes (years)
column32: Life Expectancy at Age 65, both sexes (years)
column35: Life Expectancy at Age 80, both sexes (years)
column39: Infant Mortality Rate (infant deaths per 1,000 live births)
column42: Under-Five Mortality (deaths under age 5 per 1,000 live births)
column43: Mortality before Age 40, both sexes (deaths under age 40 per 1,000 live births)
column44: Male Mortality before Age 40 (deaths under age 40 per 1,000 male live births)
column45: Female Mortality before Age 40 (deaths under age 40 per 1,000 female live births)
column46: Mortality before Age 60, both sexes (deaths under age 60 per 1,000 live births)
column47: Male Mortality before Age 60 (deaths under age 60 per 1,000 male live births)
column48: Female Mortality before Age 60 (deaths under age 60 per 1,000 female live births)
column49: Mortality between Age 15 and 50, both sexes (deaths under age 50 per 1,000 alive at age 15)
column50: Male Mortality between Age 15 and 50 (deaths under age 50 per 1,000 males alive at age 15)
column51: Female Mortality between Age 15 and 50 (deaths under age 50 per 1,000 females alive at age 15)
column52: Mortality between Age 15 and 60, both sexes (deaths under age 60 per 1,000 alive at age 15)
column53: Male Mortality between Age 15 and 60 (deaths under age 60 per 1,000 males alive at age 15)
column54: Female Mortality between Age 15 and 60 (deaths under age 60 per 1,000 females alive at age 15)
